casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joseph M. ROMANO 199PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 2, 2016 Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Ramano, Joseph M. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 1st of November 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of November 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 17th day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
